editorialNotes.short: Have the time of your life with a Dirty Dancing special.
Hop on the Astral Express and live interplanetary adventures.

editorialNotes.standard: Smash monsters, wield awesome weapons and explore an unforgettable megacity in this cyberpunk adventure from the makers of Genshin Impact and Honkai: Star Rail.

Presented as a holotable full of Star Wars champions, Galaxy of Heroes lets you form a team and leap into thrilling turn-based battles. Playing as Luke Skywalker, Boba Fett, Ahsoka Tano and other characters from the films and animated series, you’ll need smart tactics to beat enemy squads. Missions take you from Hoth to Tatooine to Imperial ships—and gorgeous graphics make every sabre slash and blaster shot look spectacular. Even when you’re not fighting, though, the piles of unlockable characters, gear and abilities ensure you’ll have plenty to do.

ios.subtitle: Make a Cake For Birthday Party

editorialNotes.standard: If you’ve ever dreamed of ruling your own fantasy world populated with scaly serpents and other mythical beasties, Dragon City is a treasure trove. It’s delightfully satisfying to breed, hatch, and raise dragons with an array of elemental abilities, and then enter them in Pokémon-style battles against friends or exciting league tournaments. If you’re a more peaceful dragon-lord in search of relaxation, simply clear land, build habitats, and develop enough farms to feed your ever-growing population of wily wyverns.
editorialNotes.short: Visit Puzzle Island for all-new games to play and special rewards.
